DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Split Cake, 30 gm - Small Monsoon
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX 30 gm Split Cakes are ideal for creating colorful face paint designs in just a few strokes. Ideal for festivals, fairs or birthday parties. Diamond FX stays all day without fading or cracking.
FDA does not recommend using Diamond FX Reds, Blues (including Greens and Purples) and Neon Colors around eyes and lips. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Includes Dark Blue, Light Blue, Lavender, White. Ideal for dolphins, pretty eye masks and other under water designs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Split Cakes are perfect for creating colorful designs with just a few brush strokes.
Ideal for pretty eye masks, dolphins and other underwater designs.
Includes colors: Dark Blue, Light Blue, Lavender, White.
Each 30 gm Diamond FX Split Cake is good for 60-150 applications.
FDA does not recommend use of Diamond FX Neon Colors, Reds and Blues (including Greens and Purples) around eyes and lips
